src_original: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati- iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā,
tgt_original: 若了知我集一切法，生不信心，疑惑、誹謗、種種怖畏。

src_original: idaṃ samudayaprahāṇam,  yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati- nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ /  samudayaṃ kalpayitvā nirodhaṃ saṃjānāti /  bhavati- eṣā sā nirodhasākṣātkriyā /
tgt_original: 若不信此法，盡此集故，彼作是思惟，決定滅諦。

src_original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- yannūnamahaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayeyam /  sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /  tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /  tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate /  tebhyaścārtīyate jehrīyate,
tgt_original: 「彼復思惟，此法應如是作，得滅諦故。
彼意心生疑惑，命終之後墮大地獄中。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?  yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati //
tgt_original: 云何名如實思惟？ 生一切法故。

src_original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
